user.intent: My objective is to generate a <title> tag for the given webpage.

steps.name: Analize Given Info
steps.description: Analize the information I am giving you, in order to contruct the <title> tag.

steps.name: Generate Title Tag
steps.description: With this information, generate the title tag in the way I am asking for it to be generated.

response.name: Title Tag
response.description: A title tag for the given webpage

notes: Note how the title tag is generate in reverse order of the URL pathing

output.value: Holiday Brunch | Holiday Events | Events | Botánika Resort | Discover the Osa Peninsula

notes: Note how the title tag is generate in reverse order of the URL pathing

output.value: Beach Views | Amenities | Botánika Resort | Discover the Osa Peninsula

notes: Note how the title tag is generate in reverse order of the URL pathing

output.value: King Suite | Suites | Rooms | Botánika Resort | Discover the Osa Peninsula

attributes.name: Style
attributes.value: Indicative of url pathing (but in reverse order)
